commands.welcome:
Welcome to your Habit Awareness Bot! 🤖

This bot helps you track your progress without judgment.

📊 Commands:
/help - Show this help message
/status - Show your current statistics
/stats - Show detailed habit statistics
/next - Show next daily reminder time
/language - Change language
/zip - Download all bot files as a zip

💬 How to track:
Just message me things like:
• "I did it"
• "Slipped up today"
• "Had the habit again"

I'll record it and show you your progress! 📈
